extensionDescription.message: Opens new tabs from the location bar, by conditions.

config.allowBlockRequest.true.message: webRequest: Keep the contents of the current tab completely. But some non-location bar loadings can be misdetected as loadings from the location bar.

config.allowBlockRequest.false.message: webNavigation: Certainly detect loadings from the location bar. But some status of the current tab (ex. scroll position) are lost.

config.newTabFor.caption.message: Behavior for a URI which is similar/same to the current page

config.newTabFor.openAsChild.label.message: Open as a "child" of the current tab

config.recycleBlankCurrentTab.label.message: Recycle current blank tab, instead of new tab

config.recycleTabUrlPattern.label.message: Recycle more tabs with URI matchis to following regular expression:
